trans-unit.source: The DsmlRequestDocument class enables you to build a DSML request payload, such as <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest"></xref>, <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"></xref>, or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DsmlRequestDocument 類別可讓您建置 DMSL 要求裝載，例如<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest"> </xref>， <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyRequest"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: It contains zero or more <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> derived objects.
trans-unit.target: 它包含零或多個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>衍生物件。

trans-unit.source: The user may add, delete, modify, and enumerate the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> before sending to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以新增、 刪除、 修改和列舉<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>之前傳送到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: DsmlRequestDocument can be used with any DSML Binding classes to transport the document, such as <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DsmlRequestDocument 可以與任何 DSML 繫結類別搭配使用來傳輸文件，例如<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The DsmlRequestDocument constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: DsmlRequestDocument 建構函式建立的執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty request document.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立空的要求文件。

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法將<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection at which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object was added.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>集合<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件已加入。

trans-unit.source: request is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: request為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all items from this collection.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法會移除此集合中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection contains the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Contains 方法會判斷是否這<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>集合包含指定<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref>要搜尋的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object is part of the collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件是集合的一部分<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，否則為。

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 方法會複製整個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>到一維陣列，從目標陣列的指定索引處開始的集合。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 一維陣列，是從複製之元素的目的地<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `value` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引`value`開始複製的位置。

trans-unit.source: The Count property contains the number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Count 屬性包含的數字<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>此集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> objects in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>此集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentProcessing property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref> that specifies how the elements of the collection are processed.
trans-unit.target: DocumentProcessing 屬性包含值的其中一個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref>指定集合的項目處理的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref> that specifies how the elements of the collection are processed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個值的<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDocumentProcessing"></xref>指定集合的項目處理的方式。

trans-unit.source: value is an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: value是無效的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The ErrorProcessing property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"></xref> that specifies how errors are processed.
trans-unit.target: ErrorProcessing 屬性包含值的其中一個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"> </xref> ，指定如何處理錯誤。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"></xref> that specifies how errors are processed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個值的<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlErrorProcessing"> </xref> ，指定如何處理錯誤。

trans-unit.source: value is an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: value是無效的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumerator method returns an enumerator for the entire <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: GetEnumerator 方法傳回的列舉程式整個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object for the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>整個集合的物件。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: IndexOf 方法會傳回第一個出現項目指定的以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件存放至<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object for which the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref>傳回索引的物件。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引值<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件，如果找到則為-1。

trans-unit.source: value is reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: value是參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The Insert method inserts the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的插入方法<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件插入<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>集合指定索引處。

trans-unit.target: 要插入集合中的索引<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: value為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The IsFixedSize property contains a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: IsFixedSize 屬性包含值，指出是否<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: The IsReadOnly property contains a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> is read only or not.
trans-unit.target: IsReadOnly 屬性包含值，指出是否<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>只能讀取。

trans-unit.target: IsSynchronized 屬性包含值，指出是否存取<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>為同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: ResponseOrder 屬性包含值的其中一個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseOrder"></xref>指定回應的順序。

trans-unit.target: value是無效的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: SyncRoot 屬性包含的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> using the SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步的版本<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>使用 SyncRoot 屬性。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>, not directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業的 SyncRoot <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>，不是直接在<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保衍生自其他物件的集合正常運作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>物件。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引值<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件，如果找到則為-1。

trans-unit.source: value is reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: value是參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.Insert*> method inserts the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.Insert*>方法插入指定<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件插入<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>集合指定索引處。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.Insert*>

trans-unit.source: The index in the collection at which to insert the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要插入集合中的索引<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object to be inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref>来插入至集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: value為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: value is not a object.
trans-unit.target: value不是物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize*> property gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize*>屬性會取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>有固定的大小。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>有固定大小，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly*> property gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> is read-only or not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly*>屬性會取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref>是否為唯讀。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> is read only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.Item*> property gets or sets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object at the specified index.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.Remove*> method removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object from the collection.

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: value為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt*> method removes the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt*>方法移除<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>指定位置處的物件。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument.System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt*>

trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>若要移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: The ToXml method transforms each <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object in the collection into an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: ToXml 方法來轉換每個<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref>到集合中的物件<xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.target: 已轉換<xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>物件。
